#summary Get the user's profile including information for first name, last name, online status among other items

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_guest


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||jabberId||jid||Jabber ID of the profile that is being looked up.||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||401||InvalidUserAuthException||User with Jabber ID:{JABBERID} does not exist||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <user jabberId="######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com">
          <userid>######</userid>
          <jabberid>######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com</jabberid>
          <firstname>Api</firstname>
          <lastname>User</lastname>
          <displayName>Api User</displayName>
          <username>apiuser</username>
          <isOnline>false</isOnline>
          <show>unavailable</show>
     </user>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/users/getProfile</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>

</tokResult>
